thread.title: Trump visits Museum of African American History | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Trump visits Museum of African American History | Daily Mail Online

author: Geoff Earle
title: Trump visits Museum of African American History | Daily Mail Online
text: Trump builds on his 'great relationship' with blacks by touring new Museum of African American History – and brings along Ben Carson and Ivanka as he vows to fight bigotry and hatred 'in all of its very ugly forms' President Donald Trump tours the new Smithsonian museum of African American history He was accompanied by Housing and Urban development secretary Ben Carson, along with Ivanka Trump They viewed an exhibit featuring Benjamin Banneker, a former slave who became a prominent surveyor He had planned to tour the museum before the inauguration President Obama suggested he check it out Trump last week called himself the 'least racist person' Museum officials spoke about Haitian revolutionary leader Toussaint Louverture and Benjamin Banneker Carson showed Trump an exhibit on Carson Trump this month hailed the late Frederick Douglass as 'an example of somebody who’s done an amazing job and is getting recognized more and more' Published: 14:24 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 15:29 GMT, 21 February 2017 14 shares
